name: 天命奇御 Fate Seeker
detailed_description:
Produced by JSL ENTERTAINMENT, Fate Seeker is an original oriental role-playing action game set in the stunning KongFu universe. You play as the unruly teen, Stormy Chai, who accidentally unveiled conspiracy and hunted ever since. Escaping from death, Stormy decided to carry on the fate of “the Chosen One” to save the world. Journey on as the master of swordsman with open world mission for you to explore intensive live combat to challenge and overflowing plots to be enchanted. Your choice defines your destiny, and alter endings. Will you be the conquerer the world or the mighty hermit? Step into this universe to find out!

Feature

Various plots with multi-ending! Unrestricted to main storyline, as a free universe with endless tasks is for you to explore
Master and mix-match martial art as you wish with addictive thrilling live combat!
The Eight Divinatory Trigrams to train in endless ways, infused with story, combats and missions. Define your true fate!
Fascinating side quests with unpredictable hidden plots will create unlimited surprises for you to discover!

short_description: Fate Seeker is an original action role-playing PC game developed by JSL ENTERTAINMENT. You play as “the Chosen One”, destined to change the universe. Wonder freely in countless main storyline, and challenge yourself to solve mysteries, master martial art and nurture friendship or even true love.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“《Fate seeker》Unique gem in the modern martial art game”
8.1 – 游民星空

“《Fate seeker》：The bloom from Jin Yong‘s dream of Jianghu”
8.5 – 游侠网

“New take on chinese martial arts《fate seeker》： exciting battle combined with intense exploration”
9.6 – 巴哈姆特

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimalne:
  • System operacyjny: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 32bit
  • Procesor: Intel Core i5 2.8HZ or equivalent
  • Pamięć: 4 GB RAM
  • Karta graficzna: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Wersja 11
  • Miejsce na dysku: 10 GB dostępnej przestrzeni
  • Karta dźwiękowa: DirectSound Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Zalecane:
  • System operacyjny: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64bit
  • Procesor: Intel Core i5 4690K or equivalent
  • Pamięć: 8 GB RAM
  • Karta graficzna: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Wersja 11
  • Miejsce na dysku: 10 GB dostępnej przestrzeni
  • Karta dźwiękowa: DirectSound Compatible

developers: 甲山林娛樂股份有限公司
